name: One Screen Staycation
description:
Lost the first day but, all in all, I'm pretty pleased. 

A super short and casual adventure comprised of nothing but some long, vertical platforms on a single screen. The goal was to replicate common adventure game areas using nothing but the shapes and obstacles I could create out of said platforms. A lot of level design time was definitely sacrificed for troubleshooting other issues but nothing a bit of royalty-free sounds can't fix! 

Modified royalty-free sound effects courtesy of:

http://soundbible.com/1166-Running-Water.html <-- rumble (yes, that's pitched-down tap water) 

htts://freesound.org/people/OwlStorm/sounds/151229/ <-- footsteps / land https://freesound.org/people/LloydEvans09/sounds/187024/ <-- jump https://freesound.org/people/DWOBoyle/sounds/136971/ <-- rain loop http://soundbible.com/1810-Wind.html <-- wind https://freesound.org/people/Sclolex/sounds/177958/ <-- cave drip / desert
